GULF OF MEXICO.
CARIBBEAN SEA.
46 FOOT S/V POLONIUM, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, OVERDUE
UNITED STATES TO MEXICO TO CUBA TO BAHAMAS. VESSEL
REPORTED ENGINE TROUBLE. LAST KNOWN POSITION
25-28.6N 087-54.1W AT 082200Z MAY. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO U.S. COAST GUARD
RCC MIAMI, PHONE: 305 415 6800.
